en.title: TSI Coop Data & Privacy Policy
en.introduction: At TSI Digital Hub, we are committed to transparently collecting and processing your personal data to provide and improve our services for businesses and professionals. This policy details what data we collect, why, and how it's used, in full compliance with the Digital Personal Data Protection Act, 2023. Your privacy choices are important to us.
en.general_purpose_description: We collect data for Account Registration & Management, Website Analytics & Performance, Community Engagement, Solutions and Services Showcase and Digital Maturity/Capability Assessments

data_processing_purposes.name: Account Registration & Management
data_processing_purposes.description: To create and manage your business or professional account, enable login, and provide access to exclusive content and services on the TSI Coop website. This data is essential for you to have an account with us.
data_processing_purposes.retention_policy: Until account deletion, plus statutory record-keeping period (e.g., 7 years).

data_processing_purposes.name: Website Analytics & Performance
data_processing_purposes.description: To understand how visitors use our website, which pages are most popular, and identify areas for improvement. This helps us enhance your browse experience and site performance.
data_processing_purposes.retention_policy: Up to 24 months (for aggregated analytics data).

data_processing_purposes.name: Community Engagement
data_processing_purposes.description: Your community interactions such as technical posts, meetings/webinars invite, enquiries, RFPs, testimonials, upport request and grievances. This helps us offer stakeholder collaboration in the MSME tech ecosystem
data_processing_purposes.retention_policy: Up to 2 years from last engagement, or until consent withdrawal.

data_processing_purposes.name: Solutions and Services Showcase
data_processing_purposes.description: Your products and services that will help the MSMEs & Professionals to discover and benefit
data_processing_purposes.retention_policy: Up to 3 years from last engagement, or until consent withdrawal.

data_processing_purposes.name: Maturity Assessments
data_processing_purposes.description: Digital Maturity Assessments of businesses and Capability Maturity Assessment of local providers. This helps us offer Ratings & advise on areas of improvement.
data_processing_purposes.retention_policy: Up to 3 years from last engagement, or until consent withdrawal.

data_categories_details.name: Email Address
data_categories_details.description: Your professional email address used for communication and account access.

data_categories_details.name: Business Name
data_categories_details.description: The name of the company or organization you represent.

data_categories_details.name: City
data_categories_details.description: The city where your business/profession is located.

data_categories_details.name: Professional Name
data_categories_details.description: Your first and last name as a professional.

data_categories_details.name: Website Usage Data
data_categories_details.description: Information on how you interact with our website, including pages visited, time spent, clicks, and navigation paths. This data is often aggregated and anonymized.

data_categories_details.name: Device Information
data_categories_details.description: Details about the device you use, including IP address, operating system, browser type, and approximate location (city-level).

en.data_principal_rights_summary: As per the Digital Personal Data Protection Act, 2023, you have rights to access, correct, complete, update, and erase your personal data. You can also withdraw consent for specific purposes, and have the right to grievance redressal. For full details, please refer to our full Privacy Policy.
en.grievance_redressal_info: For any data protection concerns or to exercise your rights, please contact our Data Protection Officer at: Email: dpo@tsicoop.com | Phone: +91 90000 11223 | Address: 123, Tech Plaza, Gandhipuram, Coimbatore - 641001, Tamil Nadu, India. Your concern will be addressed within stipulated timeframes.
en.important_note: Your email address and basic account details are essential for creating and managing your account with TSI Coop. Without these, we cannot provide you with a registered user experience. All other data processing is optional and based on your explicit consent.
